column2:
"Welcome back. By the looks of it, I'd say you
rather enjoyed that one."

"That's not a bad thing, as long as you don't get
so self-assured that you make mistakes. You should
enjoy your battles, but you should survive them too."

"You've done the training, but now I'm
waiting to see what you can do at the next special trial."

"ご苦労だった。
今回は任務を楽しんでいるように
見えたが、どうだ？"

"慢心さえしなければ悪いことではない。
大いに楽しみたまえ。"

"修練を積んだ君が、次の特訓に
現れるのを、楽しみに待っている。"
